long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find your active Bluesky peers. Filter followers, analyze engagement, and discover who's truly active in your network.

Features:
- Filter Accounts Effectively
- Focus on Future Active Connections
- Sort Your Network Your Way

Privacy & Security:
- No Bluesky authentication required
- Works exclusively with public data
- Local browser storage only
- Zero data collection or sharing

Getting Started:
Simply install Bluepeers and start browsing Bluesky. The extension automatically collects user data as you navigate, accessible anytime through the toolbar button.

Coming Soon:
- Engagement analytics
- Profile insights

For feedback and feature requests, reach out on Bluesky: @imtomdev.bsky.social
